price: Wọ́n tún wí pé: “Kí ló ṣẹlẹ̀ sí wa tí a kò rí àwọn ọkùnrin kan, àwọn tí à ń kà mọ́ àwọn ẹni burúkú.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ مَا لَنَا لَا نَرَىٰ رِجَالٗا كُنَّا نَعُدُّهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَشۡرَارِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waqālū mā lanā lā narā rijālan kunnā naʿudduhum mina al-ashrāri
